subject: RE: [junit] How do I deal with JSP taglibs?
msgSnippet: Servus, Does anybody know how can I test JSP taglibs using JUnit? Thanks. as far as I have practical experience with ant and have read the docs of cactus I
messageBody:
Servus,

Does anybody know how can I test JSP taglibs using JUnit?
Thanks.

as far as I have practical experience with ant and have read the docs of
cactus I think you should use cactus for that ....

Wolfgang
